welcome_message_body: Welcome to Malanje, Angola! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, stunning natural beauty, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Malanje has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Malange Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Malange Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a small fee.
